#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define eps (1e-10)
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define debug(v,len) for(long long int i=0;i<len;++i)cout<<v[i]<<" ";cout<<endl;
#define debugMatrix(name,row,col) for(long long int i=0;i<row;++i){for(long long int j=0;j<col;++j)cout<<name[i][j]<<" ";cout<<endl;}
#define print(v) cout<<v<<endl;
#define gcd(v,h) __gcd(v,h)
#define popcount(v) __builtin_popcount(v)
#define sl(v) scanf("%lld",&v)
#define si(v) scanf("%d",&v)
#define toLow(v) transform(v.begin(),v.end(),v.begin(),::tolower)
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main(){
	//freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    ll t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        string str;
        int k;
        cin >> str >> k;
        int last = str.length()-1;
        int last2 = last-1,last3 = last-2;
        switch(k){
        case 1:
            cout << "YES\n";
            break;
        case 2:
            cout << ((str[last]-48)%2 == 0 ? "YES" : "NO") << endl;
            break;
        case 3:
            {
                int sum = 0;
            for(ll i = 0;i < str.length();++i)
                sum += str[i]-48;
            cout << (sum%3 == 0 ? "YES" : "NO") << endl;
            break;
            }
        case 4:
            {
                int w = ((str[last2]-48)*10 + str[last]-48);
            cout << (w%4 == 0 ? "YES" : "NO") << endl;
            break;
            }
        case 5:
            {
                int w = str[last]-48;
            if(w == 0 || w == 5)
                cout << "YES" << endl;
            else
                cout << "NO" << endl;
            break;
            }
        case 6:
            {
            int sum = 0;
            for(ll i = 0;i < str.length();++i)
                sum += str[i]-48;
            cout << ((sum%3 == 0) && ((str[last]-48)%2 == 0)  ? "YES" : "NO") << endl;
            break;
            }
        case 7:
            reverse(str.begin(),str.end());
            {
            int arr[] = {1,3,2,6,4,5};
            int j = 0,sum = 0;
            for(ll i = 0;i < str.length();++i){
                sum += (str[i]-48)*arr[j];
                j++;
                j %= 6;
            }
            cout << (sum%7 == 0 ? "YES" : "NO") << endl;
            break;
            }
        case 8:
            {int w = (str[last3]-48)*100 + (str[last2]-48)*10 + (str[last]-48);
            cout << (w%8 == 0 ? "YES" : "NO") << endl;
            break;}
        case 9:
            {int sum = 0;
            for(ll i = 0;i < str.length();++i)
                sum += str[i]-48;
            cout << (sum%9 == 0 ? "YES" : "NO") << endl;
            break;}
        case 10:
            cout << (str[last] == '0' ? "YES" : "NO") << endl;
            break;

        }
    }
   	return 0;
}
